name: integrate-sdk
description: Type-safe TypeScript SDK for MCP Client with plugin-based OAuth provider configuration

scripts.build: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm && bun run build:types
scripts.test: bun test tests/protocol tests/plugins tests/client tests/integrations tests/integration/simple-integration.test.ts
scripts.test:watch: bun test --watch tests/protocol tests/plugins tests/client tests/integrations tests/integration/simple-integration.test.ts
scripts.test:unit: bun test tests/protocol tests/plugins tests/client tests/integrations
scripts.test:coverage: bun test --coverage tests/protocol tests/plugins tests/client tests/integrations tests/integration/simple-integration.test.ts
